name: Notice.AAA6.GeneralApps.ApplicationFeeRequired.Applicant
descriptionEn: To finish making your application, you must pay the application fee of ${applicationFee} as soon as possible. Your application will be paused and will not be sent to the other parties or considered by a judge until you’ve paid the fee. Pay application fee
descriptionCy: I orffen gwneud eich cais, rhaid i chi dalu’r ffi gwneud cais o ${applicationFee} cyn gynted â phosib. Bydd eich cais yn cael ei oedi ac ni chaiff ei anfon at y partïon eraill na’i ystyried gan farnwr nes i chi dalu’r ffi. Talu’r ffi gwneud cais
